story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2010, Bakırcılar Consulting has been operating in the business consulting industry for over 15 years. We offer services in a wide range from strategy consulting to digital transformation, from business development to human resources management.
story.paragraph2: By prioritizing customer satisfaction, we have become a trusted brand in the industry with effective strategies and expert consulting services. With our experienced consultant team and modern business methodologies, we provide solutions for companies of all sizes.
story.paragraph3: With our strategic thinking approach, data-driven methodology and expertise in developing sustainable business models, we act thinking about both today and the future.

aboutPage.visionDetailed: To become a leading company in the consulting industry by analyzing constantly changing business world dynamics at the highest level in the Turkish and global market.
aboutPage.missionDetailed: To contribute to our customers' growth by offering strategic and sustainable business solutions without compromising our principles of quality, speed and reliability.
